technicalInsights.insight: Always provide a slot="fallback" (skeleton/loading state) for server:defer components to prevent Layout Shift (CLS).
Update .stylelintrc.json to ignore Tailwind-specific at-rules (@theme, @plugin, @layer) and newer CSS properties (text-wrap, scrollbar-gutter) to avoid false positives.
Append "deg" to hue values in oklch() colors (e.g., oklch(22% 0.05 230deg)) to ensure full compatibility with modern CSS parsers and linters.
Use "clip-path: inset(50%)" for .sr-only utility classes. The traditional "clip: rect(0,0,0,0)" is deprecated and inconsistent across modern browsers.
Disallow hardcoded hex/rgba values in component styles. Enforce mapping to CSS variables defined in global.css via Stylelint disallowed-list.
Utilize clamp() for all typography and spacing scales to ensure seamless responsiveness without excessive breakpoints.
Integrated astro-compressor for post-build HTML/JS/CSS compression (Gzip & Brotli). Essential for Elite Performance architecture to minimize LCP and TBT.

Implemented Astro 6 Middleware (src/middleware.ts) to enforce 'Elite' security headers: Content-Security-Policy (CSP), X-Frame-Options, and Permissions-Policy. This protects against XSS, Clickjacking, and FLOC tracking.

Swup Container Requirement: Always ensure new pages render their primary content within the designated main container (e.g., <main id="swup">) defined in the layout. Content outside this container will not be swapped during transitions.

Script Re-execution: Swup reloads scripts in <head> by default. Inline scripts in <body> must be written to be compatible with re-execution or moved to external files to prevent memory leaks or duplicate event listeners.
